title: E-Learning Course for Strengthening Clinical Speech-Language Pathology Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational understanding of healthcare settings
context.additional_context: Optimizing smartphone-based online learning environments for practicing speech-language pathologists

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real clinical cases to create speech disorder patient evaluation protocols with 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform peer evaluations and feedback at least three times using real-time collaboration tools provided in video conferencing systems.
Learners can master at least four intervention techniques for major types of speech disorders and apply them in simulated clinical scenarios.
Learners can complete learning content twice weekly via a mobile learning management system (LMS) and achieve a quiz score of at least 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
